tossup_question: 41) PHYSICS  The particle-in-a-box scenario most directly corresponds to which of the following types of motion?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Translational
X) Therma
Y) Vibrational
Z) Rotational
bonus_question: 41) PHYSICS  A 2 kilogram mass is moving in uniform circular motion around a circle of radius 3 meters at an angular speed of 2 radians per second. Expressing your answer in joules, in one full revolution, how much work does the centripetal force do on the mass?
